name: NOOB Trainer 2018
description:
Game Design/Platformer by RustyLloyd

Music and Minigames by CrissOle

Mac and Windows supported.

Speed is the key to getting through the levels.

NOOB Trainer 2018. 

Made for Low Rez Jam 2018. 

A cool pixel art platformer set in a pink world with some random mini games scattered throughout. CrissOle and I are proud to be able to create this game for you. However brief it may be. It has been a huge learning curve and we welcome any comments.
